text: Vy -luchshaya iz obshchin, sozdannaya na blago lyudey; vy velite vershit' odobryayemoye [po shariatu i razumu], zapreshchayete tvorit' neodobryayemoye i veruyete v Allakha. A yesli by lyudi Pisaniya uverovali [v islam], eto bylo by luchshe dlya nikh. Sredi nikh yest' uverovavshiye, no bol'shaya chast' - nechestivtsy
